Race Packages

PLEASE NOTE: All drivers require a Balaclava and Gloves for hygiene reasons. Feel free to bring your own, or we can supply them for £2.50 per item.

Grand Prix Events (aged 14yrs+)

This event is set for medium/large groups intent on a good night's racing, and offers the ultimate karting experience. Groups will have exclusive use of the track for the duration of the event.

Grand Prix heats allow every driver to start from different positions on the grid, positions are all worked out by our computer so that it's as fair as possible across the event.

All Grand Prix Events Include:

  • Trophies for 1st, 2nd and 3rd place
  • Bottle of bubbly for the winner

  • Grand Prix

    4 Lap Practice Session

    6 x 6 Lap Heats Per Driver

    8 Lap Final Race For Top 8 Drivers

    £45 per driver13+ driversBook Now

  • Super Grand Prix

    5 Lap Practice Session

    6 x 6 Lap Heats Per Driver

    8 Lap Semi Final For Top 16 Drivers

    10 Lap Grand Final For Top 8 Drivers

    £50 per driver13+ drivers

    Popular

    Book Now

Team Challenge Events (aged 14yrs+)

For a minimum of 8 teams, these events have all the thrills of our Individual events only in team format. Bring tactics into play with driver changes and pit stops at the best possible times and your team may just get the win.

  • Team Challenge 90

    30 Minute combined Practice & Qualifying Session

    60 Minute Non-Stop Race with Driver Changes Throughout

    £120 per Team2/3 Drivers per TeamBook Now

  • Team Challenge 120

    30 Minute combined Practice & Qualifying Session

    90 Minute Non-Stop Race with Driver Changes Throughout

    £150 per Team3 Drivers per Team

    Popular

    Book Now

  • Team Challenge 150

    30 Minute combined Practice & Qualifying Session

    120 Minute Non-Stop Race with Driver Changes Throughout

    £175 per Team3/4 Drivers per TeamBook Now

Endurance Events (aged 14yrs+)

Endurance racing is a fantastic team building or stag & hen party event. It is a multi lap event which can be run as individuals or teams. These events are run on our 200cc Sodi SR4 karts. They start with the Dash 30 minute Race Event going up to the 60 minute Super Challenge race for individuals, or for the Team Challenge Races we have 90 (1.5 Hours) - 150 Minute (2.5 Hours) Events.

All Endurance Events Include:

  • Use of the Corporate racewear
  • 15 minute combined practice/qualifying session
  • Races of either 15 minutes, 2 x 15 minutes, or 3 x 15 minutes
  • Full race report including overall results and individual reports
  • Trophies for 1st, 2nd and 3rd place

  • Dash 30

    15 Minute Practice/Qualifying Session

    15 Minute Break to Discuss and Hone your Racing Lines

    15 Minute Non-Stop Race

    £40 per driver8-10 driversBook Now

  • Challenge 45

    15 Minute Practice/Qualifying Session

    15 Minute Break

    2 x 15 Minute Races with 15 Minute Breaks between

    £50 per driver8-10 drivers

    Popular

    Book Now

  • Super Challenge 60

    15 Minute Practice/Qualifying Session

    15 Minute Break

    3 x 15 Minute Races with 15 Minute Breaks between

    £60 per driver8-10 driversBook Now

About Us

Fastlane Karting is located in Fenton, Stoke on Trent, Staffordshire and within easy driving distance of Shropshire, Cheshire and Derbyshire in the East Midlands. We operate Sodi karts for corporate, group parties and arrive & drive sessions. We also have Cadet karts for juniors.

Address

  • 151 King Street
  • Stoke On Trent
  • Staffordshire
